roles.name: Admin
roles.description: Full access to manage project managers, projects, and system settings.

roles.name: Project Manager
roles.description: Can manage their own projects and interact with assigned clients.

roles.name: UI/UX Designer
roles.description: Designs the UI/UX for the projects.

roles.name: HTML Developer
roles.description: Develops the HTML/CSS components of the project.

roles.name: Frontend Developer
roles.description: Develops the frontend of the project.

roles.name: Backend Developer
roles.description: Develops the backend of the project.

roles.name: Full Stack Developer
roles.description: Develops both the frontend and backend of the project.

roles.name: QA
roles.description: Tests the functionality and quality of the project.

roles.name: BA
roles.description: Analyzes business requirements and manages the process.

roles.name: Other
roles.description: Other roles that do not fall under the predefined categories.
